subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Alex Ovechkin scored his N.H.L.-leading 50th goal, becoming the Washington Capitals’ first three-time 50-goal scorer, in a 5-2 road victory over the Tampa Bay Lightning.
snippet: Alex Ovechkin scored his N.H.L.-leading 50th goal, becoming the Washington Capitals’ first three-time 50-goal scorer, in a 5-2 road victory over the Tampa Bay Lightning.
